name: The Multiplayer Pazaak Game !
description:
It' s the online version of the, board game Pazaak, from the Star Wars: KOTOR

You can play this game only WITH STEAM ONLINE.

To play game: 

1) Unarchive game

2) Start Steam

3)In main menu press host button

4) Invite your friend, in steam. 

5) Enter name of the room, and press Create

6)Another player select your room and press join

7)Both players set ready up

8)Host press the start button

9)Choose card and play ! 

----To play again restart game and Steam ---
